description: this is definitely not optomized for mobile devices
Unfortunely, I cannot fill the Server (Hostname) to configure an account. I don't know why but the field just doesn't accept any entry.

Trojitá's UI reminds me a lot to the programs i 
used in the early 2000s, which - for me - is'nt a bad thing.

In the description they said that it's working on cell phones, but it's not.
At least on the Pine64 Pinephone.

If you are Desktop user and if you are looking for a retro style Email client with fast and minimal interface.
Give Trojitá a try.

Using the Pinephone?
you may want try another Client
With the current version I can not connect to bluewin.ch
